{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Linksys_WPC55AG_v1p2_top.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Dual-Band Wireless A+G Notebook Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.linksys.com/en-us/support/lbc/WPC55AG |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Linksys |model = WPC55AG |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1.2 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = MDL2 |wlclass = AG108 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0013 |subvendor_id = 1737 |subdevice_id = 0035 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PPD-AR5BCB-00032,Q87-WPC55AGV11 |icid = 3839A-WPC55V11 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:12:17 |chip1 = Atheros;AR5213; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5112; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/17/2003 |estreldate = 2004 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== WPC55AG v1.2 serial numbers appear to start with '''MDL2'''. This device may use U-NII-2 channels but does not implement DFS since it predates the FCC requirements. ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Linksys_WPC55AG_v1p2_top.jpg| File:Linksys_WPC55AG_v1p2_bot.jpg|
[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5212/AR5213 Wireless Network Adapter [168c:0013] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Linksys WPC55AG v1.2 802.11abg Cardbus Adapter [1737:0035]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
[41133.018779] ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x10
[41133.018788] ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
[41133.018793] ath: Country alpha2 being used: CO
[41133.018797] ath: Regpair used: 0x10
[41133.018945] ieee80211 phy30: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
[41133.019262] ath5k: phy30: Atheros AR5213A chip found (MAC: 0x59, PHY: 0x43)
[41133.019264] ath5k: phy30: RF5112B multiband radio found (0x36)
